content.text:
# Draft:Edward H Carpenter

Edward H Carpenter (Sept 16, 1973 –) is an American author and military commentator who served as a United States Marine from 1995 until 2020. He has written for the Washington Post, and is the author of five books, including Steven Pressfield’s “The Warrior Ethos”: One Marine Officer’s Critique and Counterpoint., and Blue Helmet: My Year as a United Nations Peacekeeper in South Sudan
